about_the_game:
The demo version of Praecantor Lila ~ Bell Spell features the game's first three stages, playable in Story or Arcade mode. This taste of the game's main campaign should be sufficient for players curious about executing the game's unique mechanics and design, before they commit to solving the mystery of Ellisanne's disappearance.
Praecantor Lila ~ Bell Spell is currently in Early Access. The game is in active development and will be updated as its visual assets are completed.
